document.discussion_title: Trump family bonded over bricks, mortar, politics
document.topic_text: Trump family bonded over bricks, mortar, politics Monday, 22 August 2016 ( 29 minutes ago ) WASHINGTON (AP) " There's something about bulldozers and hard hats that brings a family together.It worked for Donald Trump and his father. And it worked for Donald Trump and his children.Long before Donald Trump was a presidential... WASHINGTON (AP) — There’s something about bulldozers and hard hats that brings a family together. It worked for Donald Trump and his father. And it’s... Seattle Times WASHINGTON (AP) — There’s something about bulldozers and hard hats that brings a family together. It worked for Donald Trump and his father. And it worked... Seattle Times The pressure is on for Kellyanne Conway. Donald Trump has promoted Conway, a veteran GOP pollster and strategist, to campaign manager — a role she will share... bizjournals Sometimes blood is NOT thicker than water… On Thursday, Esquire wrote a piece about Jared Kushner, Donald Trump's son-in-law who has helped the businessman...
